name: stream-nexus
description: SNEED - Stream Nexus aggregation server. In development.

scripts.build:frontend: cp src/frontend/overlay/script.js src/frontend/overlay/style.css public/ && cp src/frontend/dashboard/dashboard.js src/frontend/dashboard/dashboard.css public/ && cp src/frontend/shared/variables.css public/
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:static && npm run build:editor
scripts.watch:frontend: while true; do inotifywait -e modify src/frontend/overlay/* src/frontend/dashboard/* src/frontend/shared/* 2>/dev/null && npm run build:frontend; done
scripts.clean: rm -rf public/script.js public/style.css public/dashboard.js public/dashboard.css public/variables.css public/editor public/js/*.js

author: Joshua Moon <josh@josh.rs>
